biases.name: Anchoring Bias
biases.description: Over-relying on the first piece of information encountered
biases.mitigation: Consider multiple data points before making decisions

biases.name: Confirmation Bias
biases.description: Seeking information that confirms existing beliefs
biases.mitigation: Actively seek contradictory evidence and diverse viewpoints

biases.name: Status Quo Bias
biases.description: Preference for the current state of affairs
biases.mitigation: Evaluate changes objectively against current baseline

biases.name: Sunk Cost Fallacy
biases.description: Continuing investment based on past costs rather than future value
biases.mitigation: Focus on future returns, not past investments

biases.name: Optimism Bias
biases.description: Overestimating positive outcomes and underestimating risks
biases.mitigation: Use conservative estimates and scenario planning
